sentence.Network_en: She was , to the end, a gentlewoman of the old school , gracious and mannerly.

sentence.Network_en: Good pilgrim, you do wrong your hand too much, which mannerly devotion shows in this.
sentence.Network_cn: 志诚的香客, 别过分错怪你的对手, 这正是最恭敬的虔诚.

sentence.Network_en: He became more judicious, more mannerly, more thoughtful, and eager to please.
sentence.Network_cn: 他变得更明事理 、 更有礼貌, 也更体贴人了.他也乐于讨人欢喜.
